item.description:
The Wedeln Ski House is the former Comstock Inn and is located on the border of North Conway and Bartlett. 4 ski areas are within 20 min drive and all the bars, shops and restaurants of North Conway are only minutes away. To stay at the house you must be 21+. I plan to go to Wildcat on both Saturday and Sunday. Discount lift tickets available from www.liftopia.com

This is Valetines Day weekend and we will attend some open-bar Valentine events (optional). It looks like it will be a real fun weekend with several entertainment options. Couples or singles are welcome but please be aware that bedrooms are segregated by sex so if you are looking for a romantic Valentine weekend you may be better off a Bed & Breakfast.

I will leave from Somerville on Friday night at 6pm. I can take a couple of extra people. I plan to meet at the Dunkin Donuts parking lot in Union Square.

Overnight Accommodations:
$20 per night - recommend you stay both Friday and Sat.
There are 21 bedrooms, dorm style and separated by gender.
Most rooms have 2 bunkbeds.
Bring your own sheets, blanket, pillow. A sleeping bag and pillow work well too.
Bring toiletries, towel, etc.

Yes RSVP's will get directions to the Wedeln Ski and Outdoors Club and info on payment. This will be a busy weekend so we will need to take advance payment. Maybe RSVP will be allowed for now but will eventually be changed to No.

For more info about the Wedeln Ski and Outdoor Club please check out:
http://www.wedeln.com...
http://www.meetup.com...
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the bar in the ski house on Friday night at 9pm or in Somerville at 6pm
item.name: Valetine Weekend at Wedeln Ski House
